segments.text: Hi Simon . Nice to meet you again
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope you are Settling in at school !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am ! I've made lots of friends and I really enjoy my courses .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Good ! Me too ! By the way . you didn't tell me what you are studying here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Didn't I ? I'm doing business studies .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? That's great . You hope to join a company after graduating ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe . My parents moved to Canada the year when I was born . We are living in Toronto . Suppose I might get a job in Toronto when I graduate . It's too soon to say really .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: She's from Australia . She lives in Sydney . Her father runs a hotel business there and she is doing a degree in accountancy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Accountancy ? Really ? She must be very good at figures .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I guess so . What about you , Simon ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great ! So I'll know who to call if I ever need a lawyer .
segments.speaker: S2
